title: Company Suggestion Form
welcomeMessage: We value your input and ideas to help improve our workplace and operations. Please take a moment to share your suggestions, and we will carefully consider each and one to enhance our company's success and work environment.
BottomMessage: We appreciate your effort in helping us improve. Your feedback will be reviewed by the management team.
